mapper.insert: insert into base_role (ID, NAME, CODE, TYPE, SORT, STATUS, DES, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update base_role set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_USER = #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_DATE = #{creatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, CODE, TYPE, SORT, STATUS, DES, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_role where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, NAME, CODE, TYPE, SORT, STATUS, DES, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_role
